Class DockerImage

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.DockerImage

  • Constructor Details

    • DockerImage

      public DockerImage(DigitalOceanClient client, DockerRepository repository, String digest, Set<String> tags, Set<DockerImage.Layer> layers)
      Creates a snapshot of the docker image's state.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      repository - the enclosing docker repository
      digest - a value that uniquely identifies the image
      tags - the tags that are associated with the image
      layers - the layers that the image consists of
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if name contains leading or trailing whitespace or is empty

    • destroy

      public void destroy(DockerRepository repository) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Destroys the image.
      Parameters:
      repository - the image repository to remove the image from
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if repository is null
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getRepository

      public DockerRepository getRepository()
      Returns the enclosing docker repository.
      Returns:
      the docker repository
